sql.query: select API_URLINFO,PMV_USERNAME,PMV_PSW,AUT_USERNAME,AUT_PSW,CLIENT_ID,CLIENT_SECRET,SCOPE,GTYPE,SRC,DET,PATH_PUB_KEY,PATH_PRI_KEY from API_URLS where upper(ACTION_FOR)= upper('^')
select NSDL_APPID,NSDL_REF_ID,NSDL_BANK_IFSCCODE from nsdl_application where NSDL_LAPSAPPNO = '^'

SELECT A.CBS_ACCOUNTNO,TO_CHAR(A.MONDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MONDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.APP_PROCESSDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_PROCESSDATE,TO_CHAR(A.APP_CLOSEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as APP_CLOSEDDATE,LD.LOAN_RECMDAMT,LD.LOAN_AMTREQD,LD.LOAN_MODINTRATE FROM APPLICATIONS A,LOANDETAILS LD WHERE A.APP_NO=LD.LOAN_APPNO AND A.APP_NO='^'
